bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Writing shui xu 水蓄 , water amassment.

Pathological Condition of water that fails to pass on and collects in the realm of the lower burner instead, causing a lower bloated abdomen with blocked urination. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua shi 滑石 quoting Shang han zhi ge 傷寒直格 Mj: 益元散…消蓄水，止渴利中 , “The Powder to Benefit the Original [Qi]…dissolves amassed water , ends thirst und makes the center passable”, writes: 益元散…止渴，消畜水 , “The Powder to Benefit the Original [Qi]… ends thirst and dissolves amassed water ”.
